casebody.head_matter:
503 A.2d 931
E-Z PARKS, INC., Appellant v. Thomas D. LARSON, Secretary of Transportation, Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Department of Transportation. Appeal of PHILADELPHIA PARKING AUTHORITY.

Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
